content: the earlier instructions to make the second flipper continue around the tummy with single_crochet 6 repeat the earlier instructions to make the third flipper continue around the tummy with increase 3 repeat the earlier instructions to make the fourth flipper see third photo below continue around the tummy with single_crochet 24 single_crochet s plus four flippers do not fasten_off yet continue on next page 5 joining the shell and tummy fasten_off the green yarn and join the pink working in pink slp-st chain 1 you will now single_crochet around the two pieces and working through both thicknesses to crochet the tummy and shell together during round 1 hold the shell and tummy pieces together with the wrong sides facing each other then insert your hook into the blo of the next stitch on the tummy side then into the flo of the stitch you marked on the shell side and make a single_crochet see the first two photos below crocheting in this way do round 1 when crocheting around completly ignore the flippers made in the previous round just let them dangle crochet only around the oval of the body and shell to crochet together do not crochet into the flippers stuff as you crochet together round 1 single_crochet 26 all around chain 1 counts as a single_crochet 26 see third photo below round 2 turn single_crochet 25 all around to make the shell rim 26 sts counting the chain-1 slp-st fasten_off and weave in end see fourth photo below 6 turtle assembly head sew the head to the body in between the flippers on one of the shorter ends of the body oval thank you i hope you ve enjoyed making your teeny turtle i would love to see it so please post a picture on ravelry thank you 7
